resources.string: The Color Picker is a Java library that allows the selection of a color.
MPAndroidChart is a Java library that can be used to display charts.
Glide is a Java library that supports fetching, decoding, and displaying images.
Android-JUnit5 is a Java library that enables JUnit5 for Android projects.
Gson is a Java library that can be used to convert Java Objects into their JSON representation.
